<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby's starter by Julius Zlioba
</h1>

Kick off your project with this hello-world boilerplate. This starter ships with the main Gatsby configuration files you might need to get up and running blazing fast with the blazing fast app generator for React.

1.  **`/src/components/ConsentForm.js`**: Self-made consent form (uses AppContext)

1.  **`/src/context/`**: App State

1.  **`/src/pages/`**: Includes empty pages of "Imprint" and "Privacy Policy"

1.  **`/src/utils/`**: Useful utility functions

- **TailwindCSS [documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/)**

- **react-icons [documentation](https://react-icons.github.io/react-icons)**


## ğŸš€ Quick start

1.  **Create a Gatsby site.**

    Clone GIT repository

    ```shell
    git clone https://github.com/juliuszlioba/gatsby-starter new-project-name
    ```

1.  **Start developing.**

    Navigate into your new siteâ€™s directory and start it up.

    ```shell
    cd new-project-name/
    yarn install
    yarn develop
    ```

1.  **Open the source code and start editing!**

    Website development URL: `http://localhost:8000`!

    GraphQL: `http://localhost:8000/___graphql`

1.  **Change repository remote origins!**

    ```shell
    git remote rm origin

    ## To check curent remote
    git remote -v
    ```

  GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ID=
